alert.note: Alert for Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 5:51AM EST until further notice by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of eastern and southeastern Massachusetts, including the following counties, in eastern Massachusetts, Norfolk. In southeastern Massachusetts, Plymouth. * WHEN...Until noon EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected along the Old Swamp River in South Weymouth. Flooding of streets and other poor drainage areas is also expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 549 AM EST, Between 2 and 3 inches of rain fell overnight. Another one half inch of rain should fall this morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Weymouth, Hingham, Rockland and Norwell. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
